alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 2:25PM CDT until August 02 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Door County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport State Park, or 29 miles northeast of Marinette, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newport State Park, Rowleys Bay and Ellison Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
